ROW.DATDSC:
--风险特征：一址多照一照多址 select rownum,t.* from ( select nsrsbh, nsrmc, (select djzclxmc from DM_DJ_DJZCLX zclx where djzclx_dm=zclx.djzclx_dm and rownum=1) djzclxmc, fddbrxm, fddbrsfzjhm, SCJYDZ, nsrzt_dm , ZCDZ, TO_CHAR(DJRQ,'YYYY-MM-DD') djrq, typ, --ZGSWSKFJ_DM, (select name from v_swjg where substr(zgswskfj_dm,1,7)=id) zgswjg from ( --1.一址多照 --根据注册地址或生产经营地址中包含关键字“房”、“室”等字来检索 select '一址多照' typ,nvl(zcdz,scjydz) zzhm,djxh,nvl(SHXYDM,nsrsbh) nsrsbh,nsrmc,kzztdjlx_dm,djzclx_dm,fddbrxm,fddbrsfzjhm, SCJYDZ,NSRZT_DM,ZCDZ,DJRQ,ZGSWSKFJ_DM from hx_dj.dj_nsrxx@js3q where nvl(zcdz,scjydz) in ( select nvl(zcdz,scjydz) from ( select a.*,row_number() over (partition by nvl(zcdz,scjydz) order by nsrsbh) rn from hx_dj.dj_nsrxx@js3q a where nsrzt_dm='03' and zgswskfj_dm like '14511%' and ( zcdz like '%房%' or scjydz like '%房%' or zcdz like '%室%' or scjydz like '%室%' ) ) where rn>1 )
union all
--2.一照多址 select '一照多址' typ,zzhm,a.djxh,nvl(SHXYDM,nsrsbh) nsrsbh,nsrmc,kzztdjlx_dm,djzclx_dm,fddbrxm,fddbrsfzjhm, SCJYDZ,NSRZT_DM,ZCDZ,DJRQ,ZGSWSKFJ_DM from hx_dj.dj_nsrxx@js3q a,DJ_PZJGXX b where a.djxh=b.djxh and b.zzhm in ( select zzhm from ( select zzhm,count(distinct nvl(zcdz,scjydz)) addr from hx_dj.dj_nsrxx@js3q a,DJ_PZJGXX b where a.djxh=b.djxh and a.nsrzt_dm='03' and a.zgswskfj_dm like '14511%' and b.zzhm is not null and a.yxbz='Y' group by zzhm having count(distinct nvl(zcdz,scjydz))>1 ) ) ) order by typ,zzhm,djxh ) t
